arcade.vis

Class AuxDrawer2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.vis.Drawer
      • arcade.vis.AuxDrawer2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuxDrawer2D.Graph, AuxDrawer2D.Label, AuxDrawer2D.RectGrid, AuxDrawer2D.TriGrid

    public abstract class AuxDrawer2D
extends Drawer
    Drawer for custom visualizations in 2D.

    AuxDrawer2D uses alternative portrayals such as network and text, instead of the value grid portrayals used in AgentDrawer2D and EnvDrawer2D. Networks are composed of edges and nodes, which is useful for drawing grids. Text portrayals are used to add labels. Additional MASON portrayals can be added.

    Since:
    2.3
    Version:
    2.3.11
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

            java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double bounds)
        Creates a Drawer for drawing custom visualizations.
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel the drawer is attached to
        name - the name of the drawer
        length - the length of array (x direction)
        width - the width of array (y direction)
        depth - the depth of array (z direction)
        bounds - the size of the drawer within the panel
